target: What baking skills do you already have?
src:
You have applied for the job as baker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I think it is interesting to learn new baking skills.

target: What course did you study?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I studied food safety and sanitation standards.

target: That sounds good, but why did you leave your job in your home country?
src:
If you are going to work as a baker, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have a junior baker with me back in my home country and we worked together for three years.

target: Yes, you can be a senior baker where you can participate in product development of limited edition artisan pastries sooner or later, depending on your performance.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is there any opportunity for growth with your company within three years?

target: What is your main obligation as a senior baker?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I got promoted as the senior baker at the pastry shop and had the chance to learn some leadership skills.

target: What attracted you to our company.
src:
You have applied for the job as baker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
First of all, I like you company. And second, I would like to learn baking new things.

target: What is you favourite thing to bake?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I like to bake things, and to get up early in the morning.

target: That sounds good, but have you had any experience working with others in your profession?
src:
If you are going to work as a baker, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have been on the board for my local football club for several years.

target: No, everything you need will be available at the bakery.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do I have to buy and bring my own equipment to the bakery?

target: What did you do at the cafe?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked at a local cafe, I had great colleagues.

target: What is your job position while doing volunteer works?
src:
You have applied for the job as a healthcare worker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like caring for people. I had done volunteer works before in remote locations that lacked healthcare providers.

target: What kind of people have you cared for before?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have a lot of patience working with people.

target: What help did they get from you as their fellow nurse?
src:
If you are going to work in the healthcare industry, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I worked as a staff nurse, I worked with other nurses like me. We help each other with our responsibilities.

target: We have morning shifts and night shifts available.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What shifts are currently available right now?

target: That sounds good. What do you think they befriended you?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
In my past job, I cared for the elderly. I became friends with them.

target: Is there anything else you like about this job?
src:
You have applied for the job as a healthcare worker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I really like to help people, it makes me happy.

target: What is the relevant experience or education for working in the healthcare industry that you have?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have both an education and relevant experience working in the health care industry.

target: What did you collaborate about with your colleagues?
src:
If you are going to work in the healthcare industry, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I worked as a medical receptionist, I had a team of colleagues and we had a great collaboration.

target: You start at eight in the morning and finish at half past four in the afternoon. Would you like to ask anything else?
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How long are the work days?

target: That sounds interesting. Where did you do you volunteer work?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I really liked when I did volunteer work.

target: Do you have experience repairing trucks?
src:
You have applied for the job as car mechanic. What do you think is interesting about this work?
It's interesting to work for a company that does repair big vehicles like you.

target: How many days does it usually take for one vehicle repair to finish?
src:
If you are going to work in our car shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. For one vehicle , we are usually working with a team of two to three people.

target: The schedule will be five days a week, eight hours a day starting at seven o'clock in the morning.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What is the working schedule?

target: That's nice. How's your experience with electric cars?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is when I got my hands on my first electric car repair.

target: What is your favourite car to work on?
src:
You have applied for the job as car mechanic. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like cars and I would like to get better as a mechanic.

target: Is you father a car mechanic as well?
src:
If you are going to work in our car shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have always worked with my father on various cars. We like to discuss all things related to cars.

target: Out customers have all types of cars, so it is hard to say exactly.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What kind of cars would I be working with?

target: That is impressive. Did it work?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I build my first engine.

target: Do you like chatting with customers?
src:
You have applied for the job as a retail worker. What do you think is interesting about this job?
I like to assist customers and save their time finding what they want.

target: What does your manager require you to do?
src:
If you are going to work in our shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked at a retail store before and every Monday our manager arranges a meeting with us to make sure we are working as a team.

target: Some of our perks include a twenty percent discount on our items and monthly gift cards when you hit a required sale mark.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What perks do you offer for your workers?

target: What is your work ethic?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is when one of our regular customers appreciated my work ethic and gave me a holiday gift.

target: Do you like to shop yourself?
src:
You have applied for the job as a retail worker. What do you think is interesting about this job?
I like to make things look nice in the store. All clothes should be neatly folded.

target: What did you do at the restaurant?
src:
If you are going to work in our shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I was in college, I used to work at a restaurant. There I was working with a lot of other people.

target: All employees get 20 percent of on all articles.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do I get any discounts in the store?

target: Did you come up with any recipes from scratch?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked at a restaurant. I loved cooking and coming up with new recipes.

target: Do you have many friends that are working here.
src:
You have applied for the job as a warehouse hand. What do you think is interesting about this work?
The salary is good and I have heard from some friends that this is a great place work.

target: Why did you quit that job?
src:
If you are going to work in our warehouse, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have worked in a similar warehouse before, with around ten colleagues.

target: We package coffee and coco beans.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What products do you have in ou warehouse?

target: How did you work as a mailman?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked as a mailman. I got a lot of exercise during my work day.

target: What is you favorite truck to drive?
src:
You have applied for the job as a truck driver. What do you think is interesting about this job?
Driving is my passion and I like trucks.

target: That is nice, but do you have any experience working with other people?
src:
If you are going to work at our cargo company, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have usually get a long well with other people.

target: Ok, what is the job about then?
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
No, I think that I understand what the job is about.

target: Ok, are you still in school then?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I have not had any other job before.

target: Ok, can you give any examples of a stressful situation and how you handled it?
src:
How do you handle stressful situations in your work?
I have a lot of experience with stressful situations and I can handle them well.

target: I see, having fun at work is very important. Do you have any examples of how you maintain good relations with your colleagues?
src:
Can you tell me about what type of relations you usually have with your colleagues?
I like working with them and I often have fun with them as well, but normally only during work time. I don't meet them much on my free time.

target: You can do both. First about you as a person and them about your work experience.
src:
Tell me a bit about yourself.
Of course. Personally or about myself as a working person?

target: Thank you. Is there any other specific reason that makes you apply for a job here?
src:
Can you tell me about what you know about this company and our products?
Of course. I know that you are a big restaurant franchise and that your food is very popular. Everyone I know have heard about you and loves your food.

target: Great! What have you heard about our company?
src:
You have applied for the job as a Taxi Driver. What makes you interested in working for our company?
I am interested in working for your company because I have heard many great things about it.

target: How long have you had your drivers licence?
src:
Do you have a drivers licence?
Yes, I have a drivers licence.

target: What have you worked as previously?
src:
Have you got any past experience working as a taxi driver?
No, I have never worked as a taxi driver before.

target: Have you ever worked the night shift before? One of our shifts is between 10 PM-06 AM.
src:
Working as a taxi driver you need to be able to work during different time shifts. Is this okay for you?
Yes, this is fine.

target: It depends on the day and time of day. But between 15-20 customers per day.
src:
Do you have any questions about this job?
Yes, how many customers does a taxi driver get per day?

target: Great! How many years have you worked as a cleaner?
src:
You have applied for one of our jobs as a cleaner. Have you previously worked in cleaning?
Hi, yes thats right. Yes I have previously worked as a cleaner.

target: How long have you had a drivers licence?
src:
Our customers are spread across the city and our cleaners usually drive to the locations. Do you have a drivers licence?
Yes, I have a drivers licence.

target: Great, what do you enjoy about working as a cleaner?
src:
What have you worked with previously?
I have previously worked as a cleaner for 2 years and I have worked in a warehouse for 5 years.

target: The work hours are between 8 AM - 17 PM. You will have a lunch break between 11.30 AM - 12.15 PM.
src:
Do you have any questions about the job?
Yes, what are the work hours?

target: Great! We are looking to hire immediately.
src:
If we choose to hire you, when can you start working?
I am currently in between jobs, therefore I can start working immediately.

target: Great, you have a lot of experience. What do like about carpenting?
src:
You have applied for the job as carpenter. How long have you worked with carpenting previously?
I started studying carpenting when I was 16 years old. I have worked with carpenting for 10 years, since I was 18 years old.

target: Interesting, what projects have you worked on before?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have a lot of experience in the field and have worked on a lot of different projects.

target: Do you prefer working in a team than working alone?
src:
This position requires you to work in a team of carpenters, have you got any experience with working in a team before?
Yes, I have worked with teams of carpenters before.

target: Great, we will get in touch once we have interviewed all the applicants.
src:
Do you have any questions about the job?
Not really, I am very interested to get started!

target: Why do you think it will fit you well?
src:
You have applied for the job as a security guard. What makes you interested in this position?
I am interested in becoming a security guard as I think it will fit me very well.

target: What have you previously worked as?
src:
Do you have any past experience in working as a security guard?
No, I do not have any past experience.

target: It is a bonus if you get to know the client aswell, does this work for you?
src:
Working as a security guard you need to be able to work in a pair together with a colleague. Does this work for you?
Yes, I am a sociable person and like working with people.

target: Do you have any experience from working different shifts?
src:
Are you able to work different shifts?
Yes, I do not mind working different shifts on different days.

target: We have security guards at shopping centres, different shops, the subway as well as at different industrial locations.
src:
Do you have any questions about the position?
Yes, what different places can I expect to work at?

target: Do you know anyone who has worked here previously?
src:
You have applied for the job as a bartender. Why have you applied for this job?
I have applied for this job because I have heard it is a nice place to work at.

target: Have you got experience working any different jobs?
src:
How long have you worked as a bartender for?
I have worked as a bartender for 3 years.

target: Good, this position is for weekends only. Does this work for you?
src:
Are you able to work weekends?
Yes, I am able to work weekends.

target: How long was the course you took?
src:
Do you have any education in making cocktails etc?
Yes, I took a course in making cocktails and drinks. It should have been attached to my application.

target: Currently there are 3 other bartenders working at the bar.
src:
Do you have any questions about the position?
Yes, how many colleagues will I have?

target: What pastries have you baked in the past?
src:
You have applied for the job as baker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I think it is interesting to learn locally baked French pastries.

target: What do you think is your greatest skill?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have all the skills and experience listed in the job description.

target: Awesome. What is your main task as a part of that team?
src:
If you are going to work as a baker, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I had been a part of the production team in a cafe before. We are composed of three production bakers.

target: Some other tasks that you can potentially take over include mentoring your acquaintances.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Aside from baking pastries, what other tasks should I expect to take over?

target: Why do you like baking training?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is being able to attend free baking training every year.

target: What are the usual people you encounter in your last job?
src:
You have applied for the job as a healthcare worker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I think it is interesting to meet new people and keep them company until they get better.

target: How long have you worked at that hospital?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I think I am a good fit because I worked at a hospital before.

target: Great. What type of patients are you helping with?
src:
If you are going to work in the healthcare industry, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I worked as a healthcare assistant, I worked with patients. I helped them with their basic hygiene activities.

target: We have open healthcare assistant jobs for pediatrics, maternity, and geriatrics right now. You will be assigned to the ward that is most relevant to your skills and experience.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is there an open job position in the pediatric ward? If ever, can I help out there?

target: Sounds interesting. What job role have you played while working there?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I did volunteer work for malnourished children in Asia.

target: What are you most experienced in cars, the electric-powered or gasoline-powered?
src:
You have applied for the job as car mechanic. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I'm passionate about cars. It's interesting to know that I can help people to save their cars.

target: How many car owners do you interview a day?
src:
If you are going to work in our car shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. I am working directly with the car owners so they can describe their problematic encounters to me.

target: Yes. You will sign-up for at least one year of the work contract agreement.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Am I going to work on a contract basis?

target: How did you do in that competition?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When my past employer holds an annual car mechanic competition to repair a car.

target: What store duties have you done before?
src:
You have applied for the job as a retail worker. What do you think is interesting about this job?
It's interesting to keep the store always neat and organized. Eye pleasing to the customers.

target: What duty do you partake on stock delivery?
src:
If you are going to work in our shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked with delivery teams on my past retail job before.

target: Yes. We will train you basic things about the shop regardless of your experience in the past.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do you offer on-the-job training?

target: What did you like about team building?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is when the company I worked for in the past arranges team building every year.

target: Do you have experience doing inventory work on a computer or manually?
src:
You have applied for the job as a warehouse hand. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like to work on administrative tasks in inventory controls.

target: How did you cooperate with your warehouse manager at that time?
src:
If you are going to work in our warehouse, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked closely with the warehouse manager on my previous work.

target: The minimum shift is six hours a day while on busy days can go up to eight hours a day.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How long are the shifts?

target: How did you work as a mailman?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked as a mailman. I got a lot of exercise during my work day.

target: How long did you drive on a day on your past job? (if any)
src:
You have applied for the job as a truck driver. What do you think is interesting about this job?
I like driving long roads.

target: Are you comfortable working with a codriver?
src:
If you are going to work at our cargo company, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. I have a codriver working with me where we exchange shifts during more than eight-hour-long drives.

target: The job requires you to work for five days a week.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How many days a week should I work?

target: Great. What else does your past employer give as a great offer to you back then?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
The best experience in my past job is when my employer takes care of our lodging when we do very long-hour drives.

target: What physical jobs have you done before?
src:
You have applied for the job as a warehouse hand. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like to do more physically active jobs than clerical jobs.

target: What is your duty as part of your team?
src:
If you are going to work in our warehouse, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. I am a part of a warehouse team.

target: We have ten vacant jobs open. If you like, you can refer a friend.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How many vacant jobs do you have right now?

target: What other jobs did you have in the past?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I like doing physically active jobs because I feel healthy.

target: What is your working schedule in your past job look like?
src:
You have applied for the job as a truck driver. What do you think is interesting about this job?
It offers a steady paycheck and regular delivery schedules for me.

target: That is good. What does a usual conversation like between you and the people who receive orders?
src:
If you are going to work at our cargo company, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I usually drive trucks alone but I interact with people who receive the orders.

target: We both have open jobs for regular workers and on-call workers. Which one do you prefer?
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is this a regular job or an on-call job?

target: What brand manufacturer of trucks had you driven before?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
Their trucks are always in good condition and undergo regular maintenance.
